sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' export const DRDOScientistBOnlineForm2022 = () => { return (
Name of Post:

RAC DRDO Scientist B Recruitment Online Form 2022
Post Date / Update: 06 July 2022 | 12:06 PM
Short Information : Recruitment & Assistant Centre (RAC) DRDO / ADA / DST has released the advertisement of Scientist B Recruitment 2022 in which there are total 630 posts. Any candidate who is interested in this recruitment and fulfills the eligibility can apply online from 06 July 2022 to 29 July 2022. For eligibility, age limit, training center, pay scale, selection procedure and all other information in recruitment, read the complete notification issued by RAC DRDO and then apply.

Recruitment & Assistant Centre (RAC)

DRDO / ADA / DST Scientist B Recruitment 2022 Online Form

DRDO Advt No. : 140 Short Details of Notification

WWW.SARKARIRESULT.COM

Important Dates

  • Application Begin : 06/07/2022
  • Last Date for Apply Online : 29/07/2022 upto 05 PM
  • Pay Examination Fee : 29/07/2022
  • Exam Date: Notified Soon
  • Admit Card Available : Before Exam

Application Fee

  • General / OBC/ EWS : 100/-
  • SC / ST / PH : 0/-
  • All Category Female : 0/-
  • Pay the Examination Fee Through Debit Card / Credit Card / Net Banking Fee Mode Only.

DRDO RAS Scientist B Age Limit as on 29/07/2022

  • Maximum Age : 28 Years (DRDO)
  • Maximum Age : 35 Years (DST)
  • Maximum Age : 30 Years (ADA)
  • Age Relaxation Extra as per RAC Scientist B Recruitment Rules.

RAC DRDO Scientist B Vacancy Details Total : 630 Post

Post Name

Organization

Total Post

DRDO Scientist B Eligibility

Scientist B

DRDO

579
  • BE / B.Tech Engineering Degree in Related Trade with First Division Marks with GATE Exam Score Card.
  • For Branch Wise Eligibility Read Notification.

ADA

43

DST

08

How to Fill DRDO RAS Scientist B Online Form 2022

  • Recruitment & Assistant Centre (RAC) Call For New Application for DRDO / ADA / DST Scientist B Recruitment 2022. Candidate Can Apply Between 06/07/2022 to 29/07/2022.
  • Candidate Read the Notification Before Apply the Recruitment Application Form in Recruitment & Assistant Centre (RAC) Scientist B Recruitment 2022.
  • Kindly Check and Collect the All Document - Eligibility, ID Proof, Address Details, Basic Details.
  • Kindly Ready Scan Document Related to Recruitment Form - Photo, Sign, ID Proof, Etc.
  • Before Submit the Application Form Must Check the Preview and All Column Carefully.
  • If Candidate Required to Paying the Application Fee Must Submit. If You have Not the Required Application Fees Your Form is Not Completed.
  • Take A Print Out of Final Submitted Form.

Interested Candidate Can Read the Full Notification Before Apply Online.

Some Useful Important Links

Apply Online

Click Here

Download Notification

Click Here

Join Our Telegram Channel

Click Here

RAC Official Website

Click Here
) }
